name: Drop Four
description:
Drop Four is a simple puzzle game where you have to get as many four of a kinds horizontally, vertically or diagonally as you can in 5 minutes.  It's fun to play and super simple to learn.  This game is available for 64-bit Windows, Macintosh and Linux.  It's made with Visual Studio for Macintosh, C# and the Monogame framework.  

Be sure to visit our board game review website if you're into board games: https://centurionsreview.com
